name: User Agent Populator
description: Enhances events with user agent details

config.markdown: User Agent plugin allows you to populate events with the $browser, $browser_version for PostHog Clients that don't  typically populate these properties

config.name: Can override existing browser related properties of event?
config.hint: If the ingested event already have $browser $browser_version properties in combination with $useragent the $browser, $browser_version properties will be re-populated with the value of $useragent
